# BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Accelerate ](/documentation/accelerate)

- [ BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS ](/documentation/Accelerate/BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS)

-  BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS 

Global Variable# BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
var BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS: BLAS_THREADING { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Accelerate/BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS#see-also)

### [Specifying a threading model](/documentation/Accelerate/BLAS_THREADING_MAX_OPTIONS#Specifying-a-threading-model)

[`init(UInt32)`](/documentation/accelerate/blas_threading/init(_:))Creates a threading model constant.[`init(rawValue: UInt32)`](/documentation/accelerate/blas_threading/init(rawvalue:))Creates a threading model constant with an unsigned-integer value.[`var rawValue: UInt32`](/documentation/accelerate/blas_threading/rawvalue)The raw value that represents the threading model.[`var BLAS_THREADING_MULTI_THREADED: BLAS_THREADING`](/documentation/accelerate/blas_threading_multi_threaded)A constant that specifies that the Accelerate framework decides whether BLAS and LAPACK execute on single or multiple threads.[`var BLAS_THREADING_SINGLE_THREADED: BLAS_THREADING`](/documentation/accelerate/blas_threading_single_threaded)A constant that specifies BLAS and LAPACK execute on a single thread only.
